column5: Stopped by my blind this afternoon just to make sure everything was as it should be. There they were about 40 birds, one very large tom and as near as I could tell about 7 jakes. Monday morning should be a good one, these guys have been hanging around there all spring. Everyone else set to go?
To bad i'm not a hunter i always wanted to get my own turkey Good luck to all that hunt this year
Mine is in the sink thawing as we speak. Wife bagged it at Zehrs.
Wish you good luck Big Cliff Sounds like you have the perfect spot!!!  I've never hunt for them but if you can harvest one.... go for it and again good luck Leechman
Yes, it is Monday the 27th that it opens, anticipation .
Okay Cliff.. Monday... 15 days from now! Just trying to keep you out of trouble ! lol

They know when opening day is, once it comes there won't be one around   that's how it seems here...keep dodging them on the road but when the season opens I meet very few hunters who have had success....  Maureen
Best of luck Cliff I know you will bag one or two!
There are some large groups of birds here in Niagara. Unfortunately many are now in no shooting zones and extended urban boundaries.
Yep all ready to bag me a thunder chicken. hopefully with the bow this year

I have seen a group of well over 50 or more every single day for the past three weeks in two fields very close to my home......  I don't hunt but have been thinking about taking a course.   Good luck cliff.

Yes,I was planning to get the bow out and practice abit,but I really need to find a private spot this year as I had a father and son team 'surround' me and my deaks last year......and it was not much fun,they had guns and I had a bow.........You using your Middleton Cliff???......I'm sure you'll get one...........TC and Straight shots........Chuck..........

I think I'll use my 870 this year Chuck, my blind isn't very big and I think I'd have a problem shooting a crossbow from it. I'd like to try it with the crossbow though so if they have a fall hunt again this year I might do a bit more work on the blind and give it a try.  Hope you find a place where you can hunt without being crowded out.
..Yes the 27th is the day,can't wait to get one with my Bow  .Good luck to all who get out.   Steve
